steps.name: user open the website sauce demo
user input "standard_user" as userName and input "secret_sauce" as password
user is on inventory page
user choose "Name (Z to A)" as option for sorting the items
user click add to cart button for "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)" as productName
user click add to cart button for "Sauce Labs Onesie" as productName
user can see the cart bedge appeared
user click cart button
user will be directed to cart page
"Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)" as productName appeared on card page
"Sauce Labs Onesie" as productName appeared on card page
user click remove item for "Sauce Labs Onesie" as productName
user click checkout button
user is on checkout step one page
user input "Alifa" as firstName and input "Almira" as lastName and input "41235" as zipCode for shipping information
user wil redirected to checkout step two page
user will see the correct price for "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)" as productName
user will see the correct tax for "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)" as productName
user will see the correct total
user click finish button
user is redirected to checkout complete
